comment: Women have assumed the authority of equality but not the responsibility; they've allowed the Zionists to weaponize them & we draw the red line after the Kavanaugh debacle; no more bullshit or you go to jail like the big boys.
amr:
# ::snt Women have assumed the authority of equality but not the responsibility; they've allowed the Zionists to weaponize them & we draw the red line after the Kavanaugh debacle; no more bullshit or you go to jail like the big boys.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (a / assume-01
                  :ARG0 (w / woman)
                  :ARG1 (a2 / authority
                        :topic (e / equal-01)))
            :ARG2 (a3 / assume-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 (r / responsible-03
                        :ARG0 w)))
      :snt2 (a4 / and
            :op1 (a5 / allow-01
                  :ARG0 (t / they)
                  :ARG1 (w2 / weaponize-01
                        :ARG0 (p / person
                              :mod (r2 / religious-group
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Zionism")))
                        :ARG1 t))
            :op2 (d / draw-line-07
                  :ARG0 (w3 / we)
                  :ARG1 (r3 / red-02)
                  :time (a6 / after
                        :op1 (d2 / debacle
                              :mod (p2 / person
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Kavanaugh"))))))
      :snt3 (o / or
            :op1 (b / bullshit-01
                  :polarity -
                  :mod (m2 / more))
            :op2 (g / go-02
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG4 (j / jail)
                  :ARG1-of (r4 / resemble-01
                        :ARG2 (b2 / boy
                              :mod (b3 / big))))))
